towardMainGateInfo.route: (紅線)  台積館 →  教育學院大樓/南門停車場  →  奕園停車場  → 綜二館 → 北校門口 (綠線)  台積館 →  人社院/生科院 → 綜二館 → 北校門口
towardMainGateInfo.routeEN: (Red Line)  TSMC Building →  COE Building/South Gate Parking Lot  →  Yi Pavilion Parking Lot  → General Building II → North Main Gate (Green Line)  TSMC Building →  CHSS/CLS Building  → General Building II → North Main Gate

towardTSMCBuildingInfo.route: (紅線)  北校門口 → 綜二館 → 楓林小徑(女舍) →  人社院/生科院  → 台積館 (綠線)  北校門口 → 綜二館 → 楓林小徑(女舍) →  奕園停車場  →  教育學院大樓/南門停車場  → 台積館
towardTSMCBuildingInfo.routeEN: (Red Line)  North Main Gate → General Building II → Maple Path →  CHSS/CLS Building  → TSMC Building (Green Line)  North Main Gate → General Building II → Maple Path →  Yi Pavilion Parking Lot  →  COE Building/South Gate Parking Lot  → TSMC Building
